#Project name for the UI application.
project("Application")

#Sources for the UI application.
set(PARSERLIB_SOURCES
    "MainWindow.h" 
    "MainWindow.cpp")

#Let our parent know where we will be storing our auto generated content.
#This is where MOC will store the autogenerated content for the default configuration
#This might break if we ever set AUTOGEN_BUILD_DIR.
set(APPLICATION_AUTOGEN_DIR "${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/${PROJECT_NAME}_autogen/include_$<CONFIG>" PARENT_SCOPE)

#Add the library to the porject either as a static project or a shared one. 
if("${BUILD_STATICALLY}")
    add_library("${PROJECT_NAME}" STATIC "${PARSERLIB_SOURCES}")
else()
    add_library("${PROJECT_NAME}" SHARED "${PARSERLIB_SOURCES}")
endif()

#Link to Qt
target_link_libraries("${PROJECT_NAME}" Qt5::Widgets)
